directions.step:
Combine all ingredients except the salt and pepper in a small saucepan. Bring to a simmer. Remove from heat, season with salt and pepper. May be served hot or cool. May be refrigerated up to 4 days.
NOTES : This is quick to make and is great with minced or sliced BBQ.
Recipe by: Craig Claiborne Cook's Mag. Jul/Aug 1988 P-30
